physical_appearance: This is a pair of small green trousers. Its hem at the bottom of the trousers is embroided with floral patterns.
sgcool_label_text: This pair of green trousers was probably made for a child. Its colourful hem is embroidered with floral patterns. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_2: Pants Motifs Embroidery Peranakan (Asian people) Children's clothing
